document.full_text: the connections of animal kingdom look to prove that their longshot victory in the kentucky derby was no fluke when the lightly raced chestnut faces 13 rivals in saturday's $1 million preakness stakes.
document.title: animal kingdom out to prove derby no fluke
lines_and_colors: the connections of animal kingdom look to prove that their longshot victory in the kentucky derby was no fluke when the lightly raced chestnut faces 13 rivals in saturday's $1 million preakness stakes.
